keyMappings:
unmap `
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode

unmap x
unmap X
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab

map <c-i> goForward
map <c-o> goBack
map h previousTab
map l nextTab

map H moveTabLeft
map L moveTabRight

unmap f
unmap F
unmap <a-f>
map ff LinkHints.activateMode
map fj LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map fm LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
searchEngines:
s: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
we: https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia (en)
wr: https://ru.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia (ru)
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

map: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s GoogleMaps
# map_dir: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/%s
# map_dir: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/${from}/${to}

r: http://rutracker.org/forum/tracker.php?nm=%s RuTracker
# tor_eng: https://katcrs.win/search/%s/ kickass torrents

l https://elixir.bootlin.com/linux/latest/ident/%s Linux Cross Reference

# Google translate: 'phrase_to_translate'
ter: https://translate.google.com/?hl=en#en/ru/%s GoogleTranslate en -> ru
tre: https://translate.google.com/?hl=en#ru/en/%s GoogleTranslate ru -> en
trd: https://translate.google.com/?hl=en#ru/de/%s GoogleTranslate ru -> de
tdr: https://translate.google.com/?hl=en#de/ru/%s GoogleTranslate de -> ru
# Google translate (any->any language): 'en/ru/phrase_to_translate' (de, uk, ko)
to: https://translate.google.com/?hl=en#%s GoogleTranslate specify languages

# Search for music:
mus: https://spac1.com/files/search/?Slist=61&stt=53gKAM65OUA&word=%s Music
# https://myzuka.org
# www.audiopoisk.com
# http://mp3brainz.net/
# http://epicmusictime.com/ # online radio

# Music recognition service:
# http://audiotag.info/index.php

# Search for films:
film: https://gomovies.to/movie/search/%s Films
movie: https://gomovies.to/movie/search/%s Movie
